name: Skippy's Dinner
description: You have started your new job as a cook, cashier, and bus boy at Skippy's Dinner. As you go on to learn your new job skills you find this dinner is not what it seams to be. Skippy is the original owner of the dinner, he died age 47 of a heart attack while on his shift. Skippy now haunts the dinner and does anything he can to protect it, it is home to him, to him anyone stepping foot or trying to take his spot as a worker in the dinner is a sign of disrespect and he will stop at nothing to defend his restaurant.
